Description:
Detects the execution of "gpg.exe" from uncommon location. Often used by ransomware and loaders to decrypt/encrypt data.

Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Portable Gpg.EXE Execution
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" ((process_path="*\\gpg.exe" OR process_path="*\\gpg2.exe") original_file_name="gpg.exe" description="GnuPGâ€™s OpenPGP tool") NOT (process_path="*:\\Program Files (x86)\\GNU\\GnuPG\\bin\\*" OR process_path="*:\\Program Files (x86)\\GnuPG VS-Desktop\\*" OR process_path="*:\\Program Files (x86)\\GnuPG\\bin\\*" OR process_path="*:\\Program Files (x86)\\Gpg4win\\bin\\*")
